isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-6613 SERIES - INSTALL - AIR SYSTEM

step1.para: Install the actuating pin and spring in the bore in the case ( Figure 277).

figure.caption: Figure 276. Install Actuating Pin and Spring in Bore in Case

step1.para: Install the hat-type alignment sleeve in the slave valve ( Figure 278).

figure.caption: Figure 277. Install Hat-Type Alignment Sleeve in Slave Valve

step1.para: Install the slave valve on the transmission and secure with four bolts ( Figure 279). Tighten to 8 to 12 ft-lbs. (11 to 16 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 278. Install Slave Valve on Transmission

step1.para: Position the air filter/regulator on the rear housing and install the two retaining bolts. Tighten to 8 to 12 ft-lbs. (11 to 16 N·m) ( Figure 280).

figure.caption: Figure 279. Position Air Filter/Regulator on Rear Housing and Install Retaining Bolts

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch air line between the intermediate shift cylinder and the air filter/regulator assembly ( Figure 281).

figure.caption: Figure 280. Connect Air Line Between Intermediate Shift Cylinder and Air Filter/Regulator Assembly

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air line between "H" port of the slave valve and the direct range port of the auxiliary shift cylinder ( Figure 282).

figure.caption: Figure 281. Connect Air Line Between "H" Port of Slave Valve and Direct Range Port of Auxiliary Shift Cylinder

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air line between the "L" port of the slave valve and the low range port of the auxiliary shift cylinder ( Figure 283).

figure.caption: Figure 282. Connect Air Line Between "L" Port of Slave Valve and Low Range Port of Auxiliary Shift Cylinder

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air line between the air filter/regulator assembly and the "S" port on the side of the slave valve ( Figure 284).

figure.caption: Figure 283. Connect Air Line Between Air Filter/Regulator Assembly and "S" Port on Slave Valve

step1.para: Install the 1/8 inch O.D. air lines, sheathing and O-rings on the shifting lever. Install the jam nut and selector valve and back the jam nut up against the selector valve to secure it in the desired position ( Figure 285).

figure.caption: Figure 284. Install Jam Nut and Selector Valve

note.para: To avoid confusion, only the air line being installed in each of the following three steps is shown attached to the selector valve.

step1.para: Connect the 1/8 inch O.D. white air line between the rd fitting on the slave air valve ( Figure 286) and the port in the selector valve identified with an "S" ( inset).

figure.caption: Figure 285. Connect Air Line Between Forward Fitting and Port in Selector Valve

step1.para: Connect the 1/8 inch O.D. black air line between the intermediate shift cylinder ( Figure 287) and the port in the selector valve identified with an "F" ( inset).

figure.caption: Figure 286. Connect Air Line Between Intermediate Shift Cylinder and Port in Selector Valve

step1.para: Connect the 1/8 inch O.D. black air line between the rear fitting on the slave valve ( Figure 288) and the port in the selector valve identified with an "R" ( inset).

figure.caption: Figure 287. Connect Air Line Between Rear Fitting and Port in Selector Valve

step1.para: If so equipped, attach the countershaft brake control valve, clamp to the shift lever, and secure the valve by tightening the screw on the clamp ( Figure 289).

figure.caption: Figure 288. Attach Countershaft Brake Control Valve

step1.para: Attach the black 1/8 inch O.D. brake control air line to the elbow fitting on the front of the valve and attach the white air line to the fitting on the bottom of the valve ( Figure 290).

figure.caption: Figure 289. Attach Air Line to Elbow Fitting and Air Line to Fitting on Bottom of Valve

step1.para: Attach the black 1/8 inch O.D. air line to the TCB-6 countershaft brake located on the right PTO opening ( Figure 291).

figure.caption: Figure 290. Attach Air Line to TCB-6 Countershaft Brake

step1.para: Attach the white 1/8 inch O.D. air line to the tee block between the air filter and regulator ( Figure 292).

figure.caption: Figure 291. Attach Air Line to Tee Block
